name: BusinessAI Assistant
description: An AI-powered virtual assistant that helps small businesses automate administrative tasks, manage schedules, and respond to basic customer inquiries.
resourceRequirements: No technical expertise required, minimal training needed
scalability: Scales to support teams of up to 50 people

name: SalesGenius
description: An AI-powered CRM enhancement that helps sales teams identify high-potential leads, recommend optimal follow-up times, and predict deal outcomes.
resourceRequirements: Requires CRM administrator for setup, sales team training recommended
scalability: Works for sales teams of any size, pricing scales per user

name: FinancePredict
description: An AI financial analysis tool that provides small businesses with cash flow forecasting, expense tracking, and financial planning assistance.
resourceRequirements: Requires access to financial accounts and basic accounting knowledge
scalability: Scales from solopreneurs to businesses with up to $10M annual revenue
